name: pixie-plate
effect: Held: Fairy-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Fairy.
short_effect: Held: Fairy-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Fairy.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Fairy-type moves.
